item.title: IPC-Shareable-1.10
item.author: STEVEB
item.description:
Use shared memory backed variables across processes

Changes for 1.10 - 2022-03-07

  • Fix issue where if segments were created underneath of a parent by an external process other than the process that created the parent, the global register wasn't being updated, therefore those segments weren't being removed when calling clean_up_all()
  • All test files now check number of segments before and after the entire script has run, verifying that all segments were cleaned up ok
  • The test suite itself in its entirety makes sure that all segments created during the suite run are cleaned up properly
  • Added CI_TESTING=1 to coverage CI tests

item.title: Text-Balanced-2.04_01
item.author: ETJ
item.description:
Extract delimited text sequences from strings.

Changes for 2.04_01 - 2022-03-05

  • performance optimisations (#5)
  • fix "<<=" being seen as heredoc, misparsing of "y=>" (#6)
  • tweak docs to clarify extract_tagged takes regexes (#3) - thanks @jhannah for report
  • modernise tests (#2)
  • fix extract_variable not recognising ${var} end of string (RT#70007)
  • fix string-comparing $@ causing exception (RT#74994)
  • docs updated to correct CSV example (RT#140408) - thanks @djerius
  • fix extract_codeblock being confused by // (RT#78313)
  • improve here-doc detection (RT#74714)
  • fix extract_multiple to track whether to allow /.../ as quotelike (RT#5722)

item.title: Async-Event-Interval-1.09
item.author: STEVEB
item.description:
Scheduled and one-off asynchronous events

Changes for 1.09 - 2022-03-05

  • Bump prereq IPC::Shareable to 1.08 due to a fix in creating random SHM keys in forked environments, major improvements of its _shm_key_rand() function, and its ability to set a 'protected' option so our global shared %events hash doesn't get cleaned up automatically
  • Modified examples/shared.pl so it doesn't leak segments and semaphores after completion
  • We now remove %events hash in END instead of DESTROY. This way we can have objects go out of scope in a script without blowing away the global shared data
  • Added _end() so that we can test the END block in unit tests. END{} calls _end() upon program termination

item.title: Lingua-Interset-3.015
item.author: ZEMAN
item.description:
DZ Interset is a universal morphosyntactic feature set to which all tagsets of all corpora/languages can be mapped.

Changes for 3.015

  • Features:
  • Added feature 'strength' because of UD corpora that use it (Romanian, Gothic, Old Church Slavonic).
  • Feature 'variant': added values 'a', 'b', 'c' (abbreviations in PDT-C).
  • Drivers:
  • CS::Pdtc
  • CS::Ridics
  • LT::Jablonskis
  • LT::Multext: Subjunctive mood changed to conditional, in order to make it more parallel to other Lithuanian and Latvian corpora in UD.
  • Changed mapping of Lithuanian non-finite verb forms:
